mapper.sql: id, created_user_id,course_name, course_introduce, course_time, course_score, class_id, class_name, class_num, begin_time, end_time
mapper.select: select c1.id as courseId,c2.id classId,c1.course_name as courseName,c2.class_name AS className,c2.class_num as classNum from course c1 left join class c2 on c1.class_id=c2.id left join class_user c3 on c3.class_id=c2.id where c3.member_id=#{userId}

select c1.*, cls.class_name ,cls.class_num, pptr.id as pptR_id, pptr.course_resource_name as pptR_course_resource_name, pptr.resource_path as pptR_resource_path,pptr.resource_type as pptR_resource_type,
vr.id as vr_id, vr.course_resource_name as vr_course_resource_name, vr.resource_path as vr_resource_path, vr.resource_type as vr_resource_type from course c1 left join class cls on c1.class_id = cls.id left join class_user cu on cu.class_id = cls.id left join course_resource pptr on c1.id = pptr.course_id and pptr.resource_type = 1 left join course_resource vr on c1.id = vr.course_id and vr.resource_type = 2 order by c1.course_name, cls.class_name

select c1.*, cls.class_name ,cls.class_num, pptr.id as pptR_id, pptr.course_resource_name as pptR_course_resource_name, pptr.resource_path as pptR_resource_path,pptr.resource_type as pptR_resource_type,
vr.id as vr_id, vr.course_resource_name as vr_course_resource_name, vr.resource_path as vr_resource_path, vr.resource_type as vr_resource_type from course c1 left join class cls on c1.class_id = cls.id left join class_user cu on cu.class_id = cls.id left join course_resource pptr on c1.id = pptr.course_id and pptr.resource_type = 1 left join course_resource vr on c1.id = vr.course_id and vr.resource_type = 2 where c1.id = #{id}
